game.name: Uninvited: Security Service
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Uninvited: Security Service is a really simple stealth/exploration game where you sneak around a mansion while avoiding the butler that lives in there. Learn about the foolhardy protagonist and the stupid chain of events that led to the situation that’s happening there.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Uninvited: Security Service is a really simple stealth/exploration game where you sneak around a mansion while avoiding the butler that lives in there. Learn about the foolhardy protagonist and the stupid chain of events that led to the situation that’s happening there.
